publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3349 Alex Neil: Congratulations to the Cross-Party Group on the Scottish Economy—That the Parliament congratulates the Cross-Party Group on the Scottish Economy on its second anniversary; recognises the success of the group in improving the levels of debate on the Scottish economy inside and outside the Parliament; thanks all those MSPs, parliamentary staff and individuals and organisations beyond the Parliament who have contributed to the group’s work; notes the in-kind support of HBOS plc through the secondment of the group’s secretary, and encourages all parts of the Parliament to keep engaging with the stakeholders of the Scottish economy to help improve policy and debate. Supported by: Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3349 Congratulations to the Cross-Party Group on the Scottish Economy (lodged on 27 September 2005) Stewart Stevenson* R, Michael Matheson*
S2M-3349 Congratulations to the Cross-Party Group on the Scottish Economy (lodged on 27 September 2005) Mr Brian Monteith*

S2M-3349 Alex Neil: Congratulations to the Cross-Party Group on the Scottish Economy—That the Parliament congratulates the Cross-Party Group on the Scottish Economy on its second anniversary; recognises the success of the group in improving the levels of debate on the Scottish economy inside and outside the Parliament; thanks all those MSPs, parliamentary staff and individuals and organisations beyond the Parliament who have contributed to the group’s work; notes the in-kind support of HBOS plc through the secondment of the group’s secretary, and encourages all parts of the Parliament to keep engaging with the stakeholders of the Scottish economy to help improve policy and debate. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Stewart Stevenson R, Michael Matheson, Mr Brian Monteith

S2M-3349 Congratulations to the Cross-Party Group on the Scottish Economy (lodged on 27 September 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Bruce Crawford*, Pauline McNeill*, Ms Sandra White*, Fergus Ewing*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Linda Fabiani*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Christine Grahame*

S2M-3349 Congratulations to the Cross-Party Group on the Scottish Economy (lodged on 27 September 2005) Richard Lochhead*, Jim Mather*, Brian Adam*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Nora Radcliffe*, Murdo Fraser*, Derek Brownlee*, Dr Elaine Murray*
S2M-3349 Congratulations to the Cross-Party Group on the Scottish Economy (lodged on 27 September 2005) Robin Harper*, Bill Aitken*
S2M-3349 Congratulations to the Cross-Party Group on the Scottish Economy (lodged on 27 September 2005) John Scott*
S2M-3349 Congratulations to the Cross-Party Group on the Scottish Economy (lodged on 27 September 2005) Mark Ballard* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
